entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 4:30 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 51 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -13.7°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023
